oriented organization with focus on system security auditing risk assessments and testing information technology controls Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Information Security Analyst AHEE INFOTECH LLC March 2017 to Present Assess and document security requirements for Federal information systems using NIST 80053 and FIPS 200 Develop the Security Assessment Plan to test the security control applicable to information system Perform annual security control assessment of information system internally hosted and cloud applications Concur to ensure FISMA and FedRAMP compliance Perform vulnerability and compliance scan identify weaknesses using Nessus Research and analyze Nessus DbProtect WebInspect scan reports to validate findings ruling out false positives Develop Security Assessment Report SAR with findings and recommendation on possible remediation Interface with senior executives system owners and administrators to present the vulnerability find and recommend remediation strategy Assist in the development of Plan of Actions and Milestones POAM for documenting prioritizing remediating and monitoring corrective actions using CSAM Participate in POAM closure validating the artifacts submitted reflect the recommended remediation and that the issue has been resolved Developing and updating security authorization packages in accordance with the clients requirement and compliant with FISMA IT Security Analyst Bonview Technologies Greenbelt MD July 2015 to March 2017 Advised the ISSO System Owner and Program Manager on the security requirements of the system including updates and changes to FISMA regulations and NIST documentation and the impact of new security vulnerabilities on the system architecture and GSS Reviewed and updated EAuthentication and Privacy Threshold Analysis PTA Reviewed annual Contingency Plan Test and artifacts Reviewed and updated Security Test Evaluation STE Documented and finalized Security Assessment Report SAR Developed reviewed and updated the System Security Plans SSP against NIST 80053 rev3 requirements Assessed system security controls using 80053A Software Test Analyst QA CORNERSTONE Laurel MD January 2013 to July 2015 Able to utilize Win Runner to record and play back function for acceptance and regression testing able to utilize the screen capture to facilitate problem reports Perform software evaluation conduct tests perform functional system regression and manual testing analyze output and report problems Maintain close interaction with the management and developers to review and resolve issues in a timely manner Planning and conducting tests in manual and automated Maintain good communication skills with the developers in reporting bugs or defects from the testing to resolve the issues Education Master in Business Administration in Finance Obafemi Awolowo University 2010 BSC Hons in Business Administration Olabisi Onabanjo University 2005 Skills FEDERAL INFORMATION SECURITY MANAGEMENT ACT 4 years FISMA 4 years Nessus 2 years NIST 4 years Security 4 years
